parameters.query: INSERT INTO hybrid_processing_queue (job_id, source_path, source_type, channel_id, product_ids, auto_publish, caption_config, priority, whisper_status, render_status) VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5::integer[], $6, $7::jsonb, $8, 'pending', 'pending') RETURNING id, job_id
UPDATE hybrid_processing_queue SET whisper_status = $2, whisper_result = $3::jsonb, whisper_language = $4, source_duration_seconds = $5 WHERE job_id = $1
UPDATE hybrid_processing_queue SET gemini_analysis = $2::jsonb, generated_captions = $3::jsonb, render_status = 'ready', updated_at = NOW() WHERE job_id = $1
